author: Ella Lee
description: A federal judge on Saturday temporarily blocked President Trump’s deployment of 200 National Guard members to Portland, Ore.  U.S. District Judge Karin Immergut granted Oregon and Portland officials’ request for a temporary restraining order, barring implementation of Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth’s memo that authorized federalizing the troops over the state’s objection.  “This is a nation…
title: Judge temporarily blocks Trump National Guard deployment in Portland
